definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: In a panoramic survey of nature, speed is interest in g because it has a ceil in g.
sentences.chinese: 概觀自然全景，速率是有趣的，因爲它有一個上限。

sentences.english: This book, "A General Survey of North America", introduces local conditions and customs of the US in detail.
sentences.chinese: 這本《北美概觀》詳細地介紹了美國的風土人情。

sentences.english: Subsections provide a short overview of each topic.
sentences.chinese: 小部份提供每個主題的短概觀。

sentences.english: Provides an overview of single-file and multifile assemblies.
sentences.chinese: 提供單一檔案或多檔案組件的概觀。

sentences.english: An overview of the structure of the Bible.
The paper begins with a brief overview of the teal estate industry.
sentences.chinese: 報紙由小鳧不動產業的簡短概觀開始。

sentences.english: The survey-style approach of these textbooks is their greatest fault.
sentences.chinese: 這種概觀縱覽式的方法是這些教科書所犯的最大錯誤。

sentences.english: The applications of plasma etching in device fabrication are surveyed.
sentences.chinese: 最後，概觀等離子腐蝕在器件製作中的應用。
